Home.name: I am Asadulloh
Home.paragraph: I work on client side of website that is seen by users!

About.text: As you noticed I am a Fronted web-developer! It has been a while, I started my journey in programming! I am really passionate about creating visually appealing and useful web apps! I have created some cool projects so you can see them in my projects section! Anyways, I am looking for a company with good job opportunities to work real world projects that make people's life easier! It is amazing to be a part of huge Tech industry!
About.textSecond: I'm quiet confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my skills by doing real world projects!
